mapper.select: SELECT T.channel_order_id, T.trans_type, T.trans_status, T.currency_code, T.total_amt, T.user_mark, T.merchant_id, T.trans_datetime, T.commodity_name, T.receive_amt, T.channel_sub, T.order_id, T.pay_bank, D.work_date FROM BAL_CNCB_DATA_SPECIFIC T LEFT JOIN bal_external_data D ON T.channel_order_id = D.clear_id ORDER BY T.TRANS_DATETIME DESC
